name: Ultimate Absorb
description:
Ultimate Absorb is a game of action platformer genre developed by NexZen Studios. The game’s main charater is Eddie which is a Solider from Indian Army. He somehow got a gun which has the ability to absorb the powers of the enemy when the enemy is dead. He also managed to get into a world of fantasy where he met many enemies with unique powers/abilities.

FEATURES:-

• Dive yourself into a pool of thrilling experience
• Levels are of medium Difficulty
• 2 levels more to be added in the future update.
• Three types of powers more to be added in the future update.
